ygData.subject: Re: Mistmoore Battle Drum
ygData.msgSnippet: ... With your resist songs, you should see about 20% higher resists than if you d used a normal drum.  e.g. if ER raised your magic resist by 20 points with a
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 25 Nov 1999, Jason Rochelle wrote:
>
> Well, I purchased a MM drum yesterday, for the low price of 250pp + a
>
> After getting it I was quite disappointed. I didn't seem to run that
> much faster, and I couldn't find a percussion song that had a
> quantifiable effect increase. Is this due to the recent patch issue that
> affected MM drum and selo's? Or can someone reccommend a song I can play
> to see the difference?

With your resist songs, you should see about 20% higher
resists than if you'd used a normal drum. e.g. if ER raised
your magic resist by 20 points with a drum, you'd get 24 with
a Mistmoore drum. The running speedup is only about 5%-8%
more than you'd get with a normal drum. I'm sure it's 20% of
something, but haven't a clue what.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
